ModMetaData.name: ColdCrystal
ModMetaData.author: Rikiki
ModMetaData.description: This mod adds cold crystal. A glowing minable stone that can be used to light rooms. It also seems to absorb some heat. See the forum thread for content/changelog and related mods. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=13172.msg133449#msg133449
